page.title: 01Welcome to Great Dunmow
page.content: Our survey area includes most of Great Dunmow and the nearby land to the South. Dunmow is a small town in North West Essex with a population of just over 5000. The town is a mixture of old and new with modern housing and industry blending well with buildings several centuries old. However, it is for the famous Flitch ceremony that Dunmow is probably best known. As most of Dunmow's surrounding area consists of high grade arable land, we have studied some important aspects of modern farming. The growth in farming prosperity has been accompanied by changes in transport and industry. Whilst such changes are inevitable, a visitor to the area would be delighted by the careful attention to planning policy that has produced such a pleasant environment in which to live and work.
